author: Chris Tomlinson, Chris Tomlinson
title: France Releases Nearly 8,000 Prisoners in One Month Due to Coronavirus
description: The overcrowded French prison system has released nearly 8,000 detainees in just one month to combat the spread of coronavirus.
content:
The overcrowded French prison system has released nearly 8,000 detainees in just one month to combat the spread of coronavirus.
The country’s prison system is still overcrowded, but French justice minister Nicole Belloubet said: “The overcrowding rate, which… [+2004 chars]
